dct_title_s: A chronological and geographical chart from the commencement of the Gospel narrative, to the Ascension of our Lord
dct_description_sm: by R. Mimpriss ; vignettes engraved by J.C. Zeitter ; plan and writing engraved by W. Keeble.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
4 bar scales on map given in "English miles", "Roman miles", "Hebrew cubits", and "Jewish stadia".
Shows drainage, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Illustrations of biblical events throughout map.
2 pictorial vignettes below map: Events at the crucifixion -- Events of the resurrection.
Includes index surrounding map: Historical table, or, key to the chart of the Gospels.
Key to map (xii, 23 pages): Key to Mimpriss' chart of the Gospels.
Descriptive text throughout map: Explanation or key -- Chronology of the Gospel history.
Inset map: Plan of Jerusalem, and the places adjacent on an enlarged scale.
